texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.Title: Title
texts.FeatureRequestDeleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this feature request?
texts.WelcomeSubtitle: Help us improve our application. Share your ideas, vote on requests from other users, and follow the development process.
texts.CardCreateDesc: Share new features or improvements that come to your mind. Every idea is valuable to us.
texts.CardVoteDesc: Review requests created by other users and vote for the ones you like to help them stand out.
texts.CardTrackDesc: Follow the status of requests. See instantly which features are being developed and which are completed.
texts.FooterRights: {0} Feature Request App. All rights reserved.
texts.NoCommentsYet: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
texts.LoginToCommentMessage: Please login to post a comment.
texts.FeatureRequestDeletionConfirmationMessag: Are you sure you want to delete this feature request?
